queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter-test-r2wwf}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter-test}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-test-ufs0l}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-test}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-test-ufs0l}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-test}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter-test-r2wwf}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter-test}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Name Undefined Or Empty
queries.description: A Kubernetes Pod should have a Service Account defined so to restrict Kubernetes API access, which means the attribute 'serviceAccountName' should be defined and not empty.

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter-test-r2wwf}}.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-test-ufs0l}}.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Service has an external load balancer, which may cause accessibility from other networks and the Internet
A Service Account token is shared between workloads

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads
'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Image tag must be defined and not be empty or equal to latest.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter-test-r2wwf}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter-test}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter-test-r2wwf}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-mancenter-test}}.image tag is not provided or latest

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-test-ufs0l}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-test}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

metadata.name={{release-name-hazelcast-enterprise-test-ufs0l}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.
Check if StatefulSet resources don't have a podAntiAffinity policy, which prevents multiple pods from being scheduled on the same node.
